headline: GE HealthCare’s New ECG And AI Imaging Tools Reshape Growth Story
summary: GE HealthCare Technologies (NasdaqGS:GEHC) has launched ReadyFix, a remote fleet management solution focused on ECG devices, aimed at improving device uptime and configuration across large hospital networks. The company also received FDA clearance and CE Marking for Allia Moveo, a compact AI powered interventional imaging system designed to support complex procedures with greater mobility and workflow integration. For investors watching GE HealthCare at a share price of $80.34, these...
